com.northconcepts.datapipeline.retry

Class RetryingWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataObject
      • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataEndpoint
        • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.DataWriter
          • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.core.ProxyWriter
            • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.retry.RetryingWriter

  • public class RetryingWriter
extends ProxyWriter
    A proxy that attempts to continue writing on failure.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaxRetryCount

        public int getMaxRetryCount()
        Returns the number of retries allowed for any individual write attempt (default 5).

      • setMaxRetryCount

        public RetryingWriter setMaxRetryCount(int maxRetryCount)
        Sets the number of retries allowed for any individual write attempt (default 5).

      • getMaxErrorCount

        public long getMaxErrorCount()
        Returns the number of retries allowed across all write attempts (default max long - 1).

      • setMaxErrorCount

        public RetryingWriter setMaxErrorCount(long maxErrorCount)
        Sets the number of retries allowed across all write attempts (default max long -1).

      • getInitialRetryDelay

        public long getInitialRetryDelay()
        Returns the amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) after the first error, before retrying (default 1 second).

      • setInitialRetryDelay

        public RetryingWriter setInitialRetryDelay(long initialRetryDelay)
        Sets the amount of time to wait (in milliseconds) after the first error, before retrying (default 1 second).

      • getStrategy

        public IRetryStrategy getStrategy()
        Returns the retry strategy (default RetryStrategy.EXPONENTIAL_BACKOFF).

      • setStrategy

        public RetryingWriter setStrategy(IRetryStrategy strategy)
        Sets the retry strategy (default RetryStrategy.EXPONENTIAL_BACKOFF).

      • getExceptionCount

        public long getExceptionCount()
        Returns the total number of exceptions/failures seen by this writer. This value is also the number of retries as long as maxErrorCount hasn't been exceeded.

      • getFirstException

        public Throwable getFirstException()
        Returns the first exception thrown for any individual write attempt. This value will reset on the next write attempt after a successful retry.

      • getLastException

        public Throwable getLastException()
        Returns the last exception thrown for any individual write attempt. This value will reset on the next write attempt after a successful retry.

      • getDiscardWriter

        public DataWriter getDiscardWriter()
        Returns the discard sink for failing records or null if one was not assigned.

      • setDiscardWriter

        public RetryingWriter setDiscardWriter(DataWriter writer)
        Assign a discard sink for failing records.
        Parameters:
        writer - the discard sink

      • getDiscardReasonFieldName

        public String getDiscardReasonFieldName()
        Returns the field in the record to place the description of the exception that was thrown by the failing write or null if one should not be added.

      • setDiscardReasonFieldName

        public RetryingWriter setDiscardReasonFieldName(String discardReasonFieldName)
        Specifies the field in the record to place the description of the exception that was thrown by the failing write or null if one should not be added.

      • addExceptionProperties

        public DataException addExceptionProperties(DataException exception)
        Description copied from class: DataEndpoint
        Adds this endpoint's current state to a DataException. Since this method is called whenever an exception is thrown, subclasses should override it to add their specific information.
